definitions.text: a point located with respect to surface features of some region
examples: this is a nice place for a picnic
a bright spot on a planet

definitions.text: any area set aside for a particular purpose
examples: who owns this place?
the president was concerned about the property across from the White House

definitions.text: an abstract mental location
examples: he has a special place in my thoughts
a place in my heart
a political system with no place for the less prominent groups

definitions.text: a general vicinity
examples: He comes from a place near Chicago

definitions.text: the post or function properly or customarily occupied or served by another
examples: can you go in my stead?
took his place
in lieu of

definitions.text: a particular situation
examples: If you were in my place what would you do?

definitions.text: where you live at a particular time
examples: deliver the package to my home
he doesn't have a home to go to
your place or mine?

definitions.text: a job in an organization
examples: he occupied a post in the treasury

definitions.text: the particular portion of space occupied by something
examples: he put the lamp back in its place

definitions.text: proper or designated social situation
examples: he overstepped his place
the responsibilities of a man in his station
married above her station

definitions.text: a space reserved for sitting (as in a theater or on a train or airplane)
examples: he booked their seats in advance
he sat in someone else's place

definitions.text: the passage that is being read
examples: he lost his place on the page

definitions.text: proper or appropriate position or location
examples: a woman's place is no longer in the kitchen

definitions.text: a public square with room for pedestrians
examples: they met at Elm Plaza
Grosvenor Place

definitions.text: an item on a list or in a sequence
examples: in the second place
moved from third to fifth position

definitions.text: a blank area
examples: write your name in the space provided

definitions.text: put into a certain place or abstract location
examples: Put your things here
Set the tray down
Set the dogs on the scent of the missing children
Place emphasis on a certain point

definitions.text: place somebody in a particular situation or location
examples: he was placed on probation

definitions.text: assign a rank or rating to
examples: how would you rank these students?
The restaurant is rated highly in the food guide

definitions.text: assign a location to
examples: The company located some of their agents in Los Angeles

definitions.text: to arrange for
examples: place a phone call
place a bet

definitions.text: take a place in a competition; often followed by an ordinal
examples: Jerry came in third in the Marathon

definitions.text: intend (something) to move towards a certain goal
examples: He aimed his fists towards his opponent's face
criticism directed at her superior
direct your anger towards others, not towards yourself

definitions.text: recognize as being; establish the identity of someone or something
examples: She identified the man on the 'wanted' poster

definitions.text: assign to (a job or a home)
locate
examples: The film is set in Africa

definitions.text: estimate
examples: We put the time of arrival at 8 P.M.

definitions.text: identify the location or place of
examples: We localized the source of the infection

definitions.text: make an investment
examples: Put money into bonds

definitions.text: assign to a station
finish second or better in a horse or dog race
examples: he bet $2 on number six to place

definitions.text: sing a note with the correct pitch
